sections.title: Functionality
sections.description: Cookies used for functionality allow users to interact with a service or site to access features that are fundamental to that service. Things considered fundamental to the service include preferences like the user's choice of language, product optimizations that help maintain and improve a service, and maintaining information relating to a user's session, such as the content of a shopping cart.

sections.title: Security
sections.description: Cookies used for security authenticate users, prevent fraud, and protect users as they interact with a service.
